bioAsHtml: I'm freshly graduated as an engineer specializing in mathematical engineering with a broad interest in software design, physics and many other sciences. In 2012 I founded the BeClojure community in Belgium and have since been organizing meetups. I'm also a passionate salsa dancer and I express this energy and spirit into my daily life.

acceptedTalks.title: BeClojure School: A gentle introduction to Clojure
